src: "Agora temos ratos de 4 meses de idade que não são diabéticos e que antes eram diabéticos,"complementou.
mt: "Now we have rats that are four months old that are not diabetic and were diabetic before," he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: O Médico Ehud Ur, um professor de medicina na Universidade de Dalhousie em Halifax, Nova Escócia, e presidente da divisão clínica e científica da Canadian Diabetes Association disse que o estudo ainda está dando seus primeiros passos.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and president of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association said the study is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Assim como alguns outros especialistas, ele é cético sobre a cura do diabetes, observando que essas descobertas não têm relevância às pessoas que já têm diabetes tipo 1.
mt: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about curing diabetes, noting that these discoveries have no relevance to people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Na segunda-feira, Sara Danius, secretária permanente do Comitê Nobel de Literatura da Academia Sueca, anunciou publicamente durante um programa de rádio na Rádio Sveriges na Suécia que o comitê, incapaz de entrar em contato com Bob Dylan diretamente sobre a conquista do Prêmio Nobel de Literatura de 2016, havia abandonado seus esforços para contactá-lo.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature of the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Swedish Radio that the committee, unable to contact Bob Dylan directly about the award of the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had given up its efforts to contact him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius disse: "Neste momento não estamos fazendo nada. Tenho ligado e enviado e-mails para o seu colaborador mais próximo e tenho recebido repostas muito amigáveis. Por enquanto, isso certamente é o suficiente."
mt: Danius said: "Right now we're not doing anything. I've been calling and emailing his closest collaborator and I've been getting very friendly responses. For now, that's certainly enough."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Anteriormente, o CEO da Ring, Jamie Siminoff, comentou que a empresa surgiu quando sua campainha não podia ser ouvida de sua loja em sua garagem.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff commented that the company was founded when his doorbell couldn't be heard from his store in his garage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Ele montou uma campainha sem fio, disse.
mt: He built a wireless bell, he said.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff afirmou que as vendas aumentaram após sua aparição de 2013 em um episódio do Shark Tank, no qual os jurados do programa recusaram o financiamento da startup.
mt: Siminoff said sales increased after her 2013 appearance on an episode of Shark Tank, in which the show's judges rejected the startup's funding.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Siminoff foi exibido no canal de televisão de compras QVC, no final de 2017.
mt: Siminoff was featured on the shopping channel QVC at the end of 2017.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: A Ring ganhou também uma causa judicial contra a empresa de segurança concorrente, a ADT Corporation.
mt: Ring also filed a lawsuit against the competing security company, ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Embora uma vacina experimental pareça ser capaz de reduzir a mortalidade do Ebola, até o momento, nenhuma droga foi claramente considerada como adequada para tratar a infecção existente.
mt: Although an experimental vaccine appears to be able to reduce Ebola mortality, to date, no drug has been clearly deemed suitable for treating existing infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Um coquetel de anticorpos, ZMapp, inicialmente se mostrou promissor na área, mas estudos formais indicaram que ele tinha menos benefícios do que buscado na prevenção da morte.
mt: An antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially appeared promising in the area, but formal studies indicated that it had fewer benefits than sought in preventing death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: ZMapp foi usado como controle, isso quer dizer que os cientistas o usaram como linha de base e o compararam os três outros tratamentos no estudo PALM.
mt: ZMapp was used as a control, meaning that the scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments in the PALM study.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: A equipe de ginástica norte-americana apoia a carta do Comitê Olímpico dos Estados Unidos e concorda com a necessidade absoluta de que a família olímpica promova um ambiente seguro para todos os nossos atletas.
mt: The U.S. gymnastics team supports the letter from the U.S. Olympic Committee and agrees with the absolute necessity that the Olympic family promotes a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Concordamos com a declaração do USOC de que os interesses de nossos atletas e clubes, e seus esportes, podem ser melhor servidos ao avançarmos com mudanças significativas dentro de nossa organização, ao invés da descertificação.
mt: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sports, can be better served by advancing with significant changes within our organization, rather than decertification.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: A equipe de ginástica norte-americana apoia uma investigação independente que possa esclarecer como um abuso da proporção que foi relatada tão corajosamente pelo sobrevivente, Larry Nassar, pôde acontecer sem que ninguém notasse, e defende qualquer mudança que for necessária e apropriada.
mt: The U.S. gymnastics team supports an independent investigation that may shed light on how the abuse of the proportion that was reported so courageously by the survivor, Larry Nassar, could have happened without anyone noticing, and defends any change that is necessary and appropriate.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: A equipe de ginástica norte-americana e o USOC têm o mesmo objetivo — tornar a ginástica e qualquer outro esporte o mais seguro possível para que os atletas possam ir atrás dos seus sonhos em um ambiente de respeito, saudável e positivo.
mt: The U.S. gymnastics team and the USOC have the same goal — to make gymnastics and any other sport as safe as possible so that athletes can pursue their dreams in a respectful, healthy and positive environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Através dos anos 60, Brzezinski trabalhou para John F. Kennedy e seu assessor e, depois, para a administração Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: Over the years 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy and his advisor and, later, for the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Durante as eleições de 1976, ele aconselhou Carter sobre política externa, depois serviu como Conselheiro de Segurança Nacional (NSA) de 1977 a 1981, como sucessor de Henry Kissinger.
mt: During the 1976 elections, he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Como membro da NSA, ele ajudou Carter na condução de assuntos diplomáticos mundiais, como o Acordo de Camp David, em 1978; a normalização das relações EUA-China no final dos anos 1970; a Revolução Iraniana, que levou à crise dos reféns em 1979; e a invasão soviética no Afeganistão, em 1979.
mt: As a member of the NSA, he helped Carter conduct world diplomatic affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, in 1978; the normalization of U.S.-China relations in the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the hostage crisis in 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: O filme, com Ryan Gosling e Emma Stone, recebeu indicações em todas as categorias principais.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling e Stone foram contemplados com indicações para, respectivamente, Melhor Ator e Atriz.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for, respectively, Best Actor and Actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: As outras nomeações incluem Melhor Filme, Diretor, Fotografia, Figurino, Melhor Montagem, Trilha Sonora Original, Design de Produção, Edição de Som, Mixagem de Som e Roteiro Original.
mt: Other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Best Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Duas músicas do filme, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) e City of Stars, receberam indicações de melhor canção original. O estúdio Lionsgate recebeu 26 indicações - mais do que qualquer outro estúdio.
mt: Two songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. The studio Lionsgate received 26 nominations - more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: No domingo à noite, o presidente dos Estados Unidos, Donald Trump, em uma declaração transmitida pelo secretário de imprensa, anunciou que as tropas americanas iriam deixar a Síria.
mt: On Sunday night, the president of the United States, Donald Trump, in a statement broadcast by the press secretary, announced that American troops would leave Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: O anúncio foi feito após Trump ter uma conversa por telefone com o presidente turco Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The announcement came after Trump had a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: A Turquia também assumiria a guarda de membros do Estado Islâmico que, como afirma a declaração, as nações europeias se recusaram a repatriar.
mt: Turkey would also take custody of Islamic State members, as the statement says, that European nations refused to repatriate.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Isso não só confirma que ao menos alguns dos dinossauros tinham penas, uma teoria que já é bem aceita, como também oferece detalhes que não são encontrados com tanta frequência em fósseis, como cores e o arranjo tridimensional.
mt: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory that is already well accepted, but also offers details that are not found as often in fossils, such as colors and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Cientistas afirmam que a plumagem superior desse animal era castanha e a parte inferior era clara ou carotenoide.
mt: . Scientists say the upper plumage of this animal was chestnut and the underparts were pale or carotenoid.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: A descoberta também concede pistas sobre a evolução das penas nas aves.
mt: The discovery also sheds light on the evolution of feathers in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: As penas dos dinossauros, conhecidas como raque, não têm uma haste bem desenvolvida, mas possuem outras características, como farpas e bárbulas. Em vista disso, os pesquisadores concluíram que a raque era possivelmente o resultado de um desenvolvimento evolutivo posterior a essas outras características.
mt: The feathers of dinosaurs, known as rachis, do not have a well-developed shaft, but have other features, such as barbs and barbules. In view of this, researchers concluded that the rachis was possibly the result of a later evolutionary development of these other features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: A estrutura das penas sugere que não foram utilizadas em voo, mas sim, para se exibir ou regular a temperatura. Os pesquisadores sugeriram que, embora esta seja a cauda de um jovem dinossauro, a amostra tem a plumagem de um adulto, e não a de um filhote.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests they were not used for flight, but rather, for display or temperature regulation. The researchers suggested that, although this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample has the plumage of an adult, not a hatchling.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Os pesquisadores sugeriram que, apesar do rabo ser de um dinossauro jovem, a amostra revela uma plumagem adulta, não uma penugem.
mt: Researchers suggested that, despite the tail being from a young dinosaur, the sample reveals adult plumage, not down.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Na manhã de ontem, um carro-bomba explodiu na sede da polícia em Gaziantep, Turquia, matou dois policiais e feriu mais de vinte outras pessoas.
mt: Yesterday morning, a car bomb exploded at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing two police officers and injuring more than twenty other people.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: O gabinete do governador afirmou que 19 dos feridos eram agentes policiais.
mt: 19 of the injured were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: A polícia informou suspeitar que o responsável pelo ataque seja um suposto militante do Daesh (ISIL).
mt: Police suspect the attack was carried out by a suspected Daesh (ISIL) militant.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Eles descobriram que o sol operava com o mesmo princípios básicos que outras estrelas: a atividade de todas as estrelas no sistema foi determinada por sua luminosidade, sua rotação e nada mais.
mt: They discovered that the sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: the activity of all stars in the system was determined by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing more.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: A luminosidade e rotação são utilizadas em conjunto para definir o número de Rossby de uma estrela, o qual tem relação com o fluxo de plasma.
mt: Brightness and rotation are used together to define the Rossby number of a star, which is related to plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Quanto mais baixo o número de Rossby, menos ativa é a estrela no que se refere às inversões magnéticas.
mt: The lower the Rossby number, the less active the star is in terms of magnetic reversals.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Durante a sua viagem, Iwasaki enfrentou problemas em muitas ocasiões.
mt: During his journey, Iwasaki faced problems on many occasions.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Ele foi roubado por piratas, atacado por um cão com raiva no Tibete, escapou de um casamento no Nepal e foi preso na Índia.
mt: He was stolen by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped a wedding in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: O padrão 802.11n opera em ambas as frequências de 2.4Ghz e 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n operates on both 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Isso permitirá que ela seja compatível com 802.11a, 802.11b e 802.11g, desde que a estação rádio base tenha rádios duais.
mt: This will allow it to be compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided the base station has dual radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: As velocidades do 802.11n são substancialmente mais rápidas do que as dos seus antecessores, teoricamente, com um rendimento máximo de 600 Mb/s.
mt: 802.11n speeds are substantially faster than those of its predecessors, theoretically, with a maximum throughput of 600 Mb/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, que é casado e tem dois filhos adultos, não deixou grande impressão em Miller, a quem a história foi relatada.
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, who was told the story.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Ao pedirem um comentário seu, Miller disse, "Mike fala muito durantes a audiência... eu estava me preparando, então não estava prestando muita atenção no que ele estava dizendo".
mt: When asked for a comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing... I was preparing, so I wasn't paying much attention to what he was saying".
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "Nós nos esforçaremos para reduzir significativamente as emissões de dióxido de carbono por unidade do PIB até 2020, em relação ao nível de 2005," disse Hu.
mt: "We will endeavor to reduce significantly carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by 2020, compared to the 2005 level," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Ele não definiu um valor para os cortes, falando que eles serão feitos de acordo com a produção econômica da China.
mt: He did not set a value for the cuts, saying they will be made according to China's economic production.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu encorajou os países em desenvolvimento "a evitar o antigo caminho de poluir primeiro e limpar depois".
mt: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later".
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Ele adicionou que "eles não devem, no entanto, ser solicitados a assumir obrigações que vão além de seu estágio de desenvolvimento, responsabilidade e capacidades."
mt: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to assume obligations that go beyond their stage of development, responsibility and capabilities."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: O Grupo de Estudo do Iraque mostrou seu relatório às 12:00 GMT do dia de hoje.
mt: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12:00 GMT today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Ele adverte que não há garantias de que alguma ação no Iraque neste momento irá impedir a guerra entre seitas, o aumento da violência ou a tendência para o caos.
mt: He warns that there are no guarantees that any action in Iraq at this time will prevent sectarian war, the rise of violence or a trend toward chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: O relatório é iniciado com um apelo por um debate aberto e pela formação de um consenso no Estados Unidos sobre a política relacionada ao Oriente Médio.
mt: The report begins with a call for an open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States on Middle Eastern policy.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: O relatório criticou bastante quase todos os aspectos da atual política do Executivo em relação ao Iraque e insiste em uma mudança imediata de direção.
mt: The report criticized almost all aspects of the current Executive policy towards Iraq and insists on an immediate change of direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: A primeira entre as 78 recomendações é que uma nova iniciativa diplomática deva ser tomada antes do final deste ano para proteger as fronteiras do Iraque contra intervenções hostis e para restabelecer relações diplomáticas com seus vizinhos.
mt: 1 of the 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to protect Iraq's borders against hostile interventions and to restore diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: A atual senadora e primeira-dama da Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner anunciou sua candidatura à presidência ontem à tarde em La Plata, cidade distante 50 quilômetros (31 milhas) de Buenos Aires.
mt: Current Argentine senator and first lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president yesterday afternoon in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: A senhora Kirchner anunciou sua intenção de se candidatar a presidente no Teatro Argentina, o mesmo local que ela usou para iniciar sua campanha ao senado em 2005 como membro da delegação da província de Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Teatro Argentina, the same location she used to start her senate campaign in 2005 as a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: O debate começou com uma controvérsia sobre gastos com socorro e reconstrução após o Furacão Katrina, o que alguns conservadores fiscais rotularam humoristicamente de "O acordo de Bush para Nova Orleans".
mt: The debate began with a controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction after Hurricane Katrina, which some fiscal conservatives humorously dubbed "The Bush deal for New Orleans".
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: A crítica liberal sobre o esforço de reconstrução focou na concessão de contratos de reconstrução a pessoas com influência em Washington.
mt: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to people with influence in Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Mais de 4 milhões de pessoas foram para Roma, para comparecerem no funeral.
mt: 4 million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: O número de pessoas presentes era tão grande que não foi possível que todos tivessem acesso ao funeral na Praça de São Pedro.
mt: The number of people present was so great that not all could have access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Várias TVs grandes foram instaladas em diversos lugares de Roma para que o povo pudesse assistir à cerimônia.
mt: Several large TVs were installed in various places in Rome so that the people could watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Em muitas outras cidades da Itália e no resto do mundo, especialmente na Polônia, arranjos similares foram feitos, permitindo o acompanhamento por um grande número de pessoas.
mt: In many other Italian cities and around the world, especially in Poland, similar arrangements were made, allowing for a large number of people to follow.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Historiadores criticaram ex-policiais do FBI por estarem direcionando os recursos para casos de fácil solução, especialmente casos de carros roubados, com a intenção de aumentar a popularidade da agência.
mt: Historians criticized former FBI agents for directing resources to easy cases, especially stolen cars, with the intention of increasing the agency's popularity.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: O Congresso começou a financiar a iniciativa de obscenidade no ano fiscal de 2005 e especificou que o FBI deve dedicar 10 agentes à pornografia adulta.
mt: The Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in the fiscal year of 2005 and specified that the FBI should dedicate 10 agents to adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa fez a pontuação mais alta do Innings, 70 corridas em apenas 41 bolas, acertando 11 quatros e 2 seis.
mt: Robin Uthappa made the highest score of the innings, 70 runs in just 41 balls, hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Os batedores da ordem média, Sachin Tendulkar e Rahul Dravid, tiveram um bom desempenho e fizeram uma parceria de cem corridas.
mt: The medium order beaters, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, had a good performance and made a hundred runs partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Mas, depois de não atingir o alvo do capitão, a Índia só conseguiu fazer 36 corridas e perdeu 7 alvos, finalizando as entradas.
mt: But after failing to hit the captain's target, India could only make 36 runs and lost 7 wickets, ending the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: O presidente norte-americano, George W. Bush, chegou em Singapura na manhã de 16 de novembro, iniciando uma visita de uma semana pela Ásia.
mt: 16 November 2005: US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore in the morning of 16 November, beginning a week-long visit to Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Ele foi recebido pelo vice-primeiro-ministro de Cingapura, Wong Kan Seng, e discutiu questões de comércio e terrorismo com o primeiro-ministro de Cingapura,  Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: He was received by the deputy prime minister of Singapore, Wong Kan Seng, and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the prime minister of Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Após uma semana de derrotas na eleição intercalar, Bush falou publicamente sobre a expansão comercial na Ásia.
mt: After a week of election defeats, Bush spoke publicly about commercial expansion in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: O primeiro-ministro Stephen Harper concordou em enviar a "Lei do Ar Limpo" do governo a um comitê de todos os partidos para revisão, antes de sua segunda leitura, após a reunião de 25 minutos de terça-feira com o líder do NDP Jack Layton no PMO.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the government's "Clean Air Act" to a committee of all parties for review, before its second reading, after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO on Tuesday.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton solicitou alterações no projeto de lei ambiental dos conservadores durante encontro com o primeiro-ministro, pedindo por uma "reescrita minuciosa e completa" do projeto de lei ambiental do partido Conservador.
mt: Layton requested changes to the Conservative Party's environmental law during a meeting with the prime minister, asking for a "thorough and complete rewrite" of the party's environmental law.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Desde quando o governo federal interveio para tomar conta do financiamento do hospital Mersey em Devonport, Tasmânia, o governo estadual e alguns deputados federais não gostaram desse ato e o classificaram como uma manobra no prelúdio da eleição federal que irá ser convocada em novembro.
mt: Since the federal government intervened to take over the funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have not liked this act and have classified it as a maneuver in the prelude to the federal election that will be called in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Mas o primeiro-ministro John Howard disse que o ato foi apenas para proteger as instalações do hospital de serem rebaixadas pelo governo da Tasmânia dando 45 milhões de dólares australianos mais.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the act was only to protect the hospital's facilities from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government giving an extra 45 million Australian dollars.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Segundo o último boletim, leituras do nível do mar indicaram o surgimento de um tsunami. Houve alguma atividade evidente de tsunami registrada próximo a Pago Pago e Niue.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated the generation of a tsunami.  Some tsunami activity was evident near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Não foram relatados danos ou ferimentos graves em Tonga, mas a ilha ficou temporariamente sem energia elétrica, o que impediu que as autoridades locais recebessem o alerta de tsunami enviado pelo PTWC.
mt: There were no reports of serious damage or injuries in Tonga, but the island was temporarily without electricity, preventing local authorities from receiving the tsunami warning sent by the PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Quatorze escolas no Havaí localizadas na costa e nas proximidades foram fechadas durante toda a quarta-feira apesar dos avisos terem sido suspensos.
mt: 14 schools in Hawaii located on the coast and nearby were closed all Wednesday despite the warnings having been suspended.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: O presidente norte-americano, George W. Bush, recebeu bem o anúncio.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Gordon Johndroe, o porta-voz de Bush, classificou a promessa da Coreia do Norte como "um importante passo em direção ao objetivo de alcançar a desnuclearização verificável da península coreana."
mt: Gordon Johndroe, Bush's spokesman, characterized the North Korean promise as "an important step toward the goal of verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: A décima tempestade nomeada da temporada de furacões no Atlântico, a tempestade subtropical Jerry, se formou no Oceano Atlântico hoje.
mt: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, subtropical storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: O Centro Nacional de Furacões (NHC) diz que, neste momento, Jerry não causa ameaças à terra.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this time Jerry does not pose a threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: O Corpo de Engenheiros dos EUA estimou que 15 cm de chuva podem romper os diques anteriormente danificados.
mt: The United States Army Corps of Engineers estimated that 15 cm of rain could break the previously damaged levees.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: A Ala Nove, que viu enchentes com 6 metros de altura durante o Furacão Katrina, está atualmente na altura da cintura, já que o dique mais próximo estava transbordado.
mt: 9th Wing, which saw 6-meter-high floods during Hurricane Katrina, is currently waist-deep, as the nearest levee was overtopped.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: A água está derramando sobre o dique em uma seção de 100 pés de largura.
mt: Water is spilling over the dam in a 100-foot-wide section.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Adam Cuerden, administrador do Commons, manifestou sua decepção com as exclusões quando conversou com o Wikinews no mês passado.
mt: Adam Cuerden, a Commons administrator, expressed his disappointment with the deletions when he spoke with Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "Ele [Wales] basicamente mentiu desde o princípio. Primeiro, agindo como se fosse por uma razão legal. Segundo, fingindo que ele estava anos ouvindo, até sua exclusão de artigos"
mt: "He [Wales] basically lied from the start. First, acting as if it was for a legal reason. Second, pretending that he was years listening, until his exclusion from articles"
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: A irritação da comunidade levou aos esforços atuais para a criação de uma política relativa a conteúdo sexual para o site que hospeda milhões de arquivos de mídia de licença aberta.
mt: The community's irritation led to the current efforts to create a policy regarding sexual content for the site that hosts millions of open-license media files.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: O trabalho feito foi, em sua maior parte, teórico, mas o programa foi escrito para simular observações feitas pela galáxia de sagitário.
mt: The work done was, for the most part, theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made by the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: O efeito que a equipe procurava seria causado pelas forças de maré entre a matéria escura da galáxia e da Via Láctea.
mt: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by the tides between the dark matter of the galaxy and the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Assim como a Lua exerce uma atração sobre a Terra, causando as marés, a Via Láctea exerce uma força sobre a galáxia de Sagitário.
mt: Just as the Moon exerts a pull on Earth, causing the tides, the Milky Way exerts a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Os cientistas conseguiram concluir que a matéria escura afeta outras matérias escuras da mesma forma que a matéria normal.
mt: The scientists were able to conclude that dark matter affects other dark matters in the same way as normal matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Esta teoria afirma que a maioria da matéria escura no entorno de uma galáxia está localizada no entorno de uma galáxia em uma espécie de auréola e é composta de diversas partículas minúsculas.
mt: This theory asserts that most of the dark matter in the vicinity of a galaxy is located in the vicinity of a galaxy in a kind of halo and is composed of numerous tiny particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Reportagens televisivas divulgam a fumaça esbranquiçada saindo da planta.
mt: Television reports show the white smoke coming from the plant.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Autoridades locais estão alertando os moradores das proximidades da usina para permanecerem dentro de casa, desligarem os ares-condicionados e não beberem água da torneira.
mt: Local authorities are warning residents near the plant to stay inside, turn off air conditioners and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: De acordo com a agência nuclear japonesa, foram identificados cálcio e iodo radioativos na usina.
mt: According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive calcium and iodine were identified at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: As autoridades acreditam que isso indica que os contêineres podem ter sido rompidos e estarem vazando combustível urânio no local.
mt: Authorities believe this indicates that the containers may have been ruptured and are leaking uranium fuel at the site.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: O Dr. Tony Moll descobriu a Tuberculose Extensivamente Resistente a Medicamentos (XDR-TB) na região de KwaZulu-Natal na África do Sul.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Ele alertou que a nova variante era "muito preocupante e alarmante pelo fato do alto índice de mortalidade", em uma entrevista.
mt: He warned that the new variant was "very concerning and alarming because of the high mortality rate," in an interview.
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Segundo o Dr. Moll, alguns pacientes podem ter contraído o vírus no hospital e ao menos dois eram profissionais de saúde.
mt: According to Dr. Moll, some patients may have contracted the virus at the hospital and at least two were health care workers.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
